snippet: Re-election is a remarkably tricky task for roughly two dozen Tea Party-backed newcomers in districts that have more registered Democrats than Republicans.
abstract: Re-election is a remarkably tricky task for roughly two dozen Tea Party-backed Republican freshmen in the House, who now find themselves in districts where there are more registered Democrats than Republicans.
lead_paragraph: Re-election is a remarkably tricky task for roughly two dozen Tea Party-backed newcomers in districts that have more registered Democrats than Republicans.

headline.seo: Re-Election Tricky for House Republican Freshmen
headline.main: Many G.O.P. Freshmen Who Stormed the House Find It Harder to Stay Seated
headline.print_headline: Many G.O.P. Freshmen Who Stormed the House Find It Harder to Stay Seated
